tool.name: SCVIS train
tool.description: Parametric alternative to t-SNE for use in high-dimensional data analysis.
tool.command: scvis train --data_matrix_file '${datafile}' #if $labels.label == 'Yes': --data_label_file '${datalabel}' #end if #if $config.choice == "Yes": --config_file '${configfile}' #end if #if $norm.normalize == "Yes": --normalize your_number '${normval}' #end if --show_plot --verbose

param.name: datafile
param.label: Data Matrix File
param.help: Data matrix with first row as the column names

param.name: label
param.label: Provide clustering information
param.help: Give cluster information for graph coloring?

param.name: datalabel
param.label: Data Label File
param.help: Optional: One column file with header provinding corresponding cluster information for each data point. Used for coloring plots.

param.name: normalize
param.label: Set Normalization Value?
param.help: If not selected, normalization will use maximum absolute value

tool.help: This tool is for the initial training of the model and clustering graphs. To add data to your model, use SCVIS map.
